mapper.sql: select od_id , c_id , od_dt , od_stat_cd , od_pd_qty , od_tot_qty , rtl_prc , od_pay_amt , frst_reg_dt , frst_reg_id , last_mod_dt , last_mod_id from ord
mapper.select: order by frst_reg_dt desc , od_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into ord (c_id, od_dt, od_stat_cd, od_pd_qty, od_tot_qty, rtl_prc, od_pay_amt) values (#{c_id}, #{od_dt}, #{od_stat_cd}, #{od_pd_qty}, #{od_tot_qty}, #{rtl_prc}, #{od_pay_amt})
